name: Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
description: The anti-dandruff shampoo is specially developed to prevent oily and dry dandruff. It has a mild cleansing effect on the scalp. With ingredients that stimulate hair growth and help prevent hair loss. Hair and scalp are left healthy and fresh, with visible dandruff reduction.
usage: Use the appropriate amount for your hair type.
Leave for 2-3 minutes and gently massage before rinsing.
